statements: DELETE FROM student_accounts WHERE full_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 101 AND student_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 201 AND permission_name = 'Admin'
DELETE FROM student_accounts WHERE department='Computer Science';
DELETE FROM login_credentials WHERE username='admin' AND password='123456';
DELETE FROM access_permissions WHERE permission_type='read' AND login_id IN (SELECT login_id FROM login_credentials WHERE username='user1');
DELETE FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101 AND student_course = 'Computer Science';
DELETE FROM accounts WHERE student_id = 2 AND username = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM permissions WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE age > 25);
